name: node-mic-monitor
description: A native Node.js module with utilities for monitoring microphone usage on macOS and Windows. Forked from https://github.com/abhaybuch/node-mac-utils

scripts.copy:mac: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp build/Release/mac_utils.node dist/mac_utils.node && cp index.js dist/index.js && cp index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts && echo Files copied successfully
scripts.copy:win: if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && mkdir dist && copy build\Release\win_utils.node dist\win_utils.node && copy index.js dist\index.js && copy index.d.ts dist\index.d.ts && echo Files copied successfully
scripts.clean: node-gyp clean && rmdir /s /q dist 2>nul || echo dist folder not found
